overview: Victoriano Huerta sent his aide, colonel Manuel Guasque, in order to set up the betrayal. It was seemingly agreed to bombard the local homes, diverting the aim of the cannons so as not to touch the combatants, thus forcing the Senate to depose the president and appoint a successor, all of which was helped along by the drunkard Wilson with threats of deploying Yankee troops. English Subtitles
title: Héroes anónimos I
